xmldoc.short_description: Convert string arrays to character arrays or cell of char vectors.

param_input_item.param_description: Input string scalar or string array. If S is a string scalar, the output C is a character vector. If S is a string array, C is returned as a cell array of character vectors.

param_output_item.param_description: Character vector (for scalar string input) or cell array of character vectors (for string arrays). If the input was not a string, C is the unmodified input.

description.p: convertStringToCharArgs converts either a cell array of string values or a string array into a cell array of character vectors.
To convert a single string scalar to a character vector, use the char function instead.
This conversion is required because some functions (example set or get) currently do not accept string inputs.

example_item.example_item_description: Convert a string scalar to a char vector and a string array to a cell of char vectors.
example_item.example_item_data: % Scalar string -> char vector C = convertStringToCharArgs("Nelson") % String array -> cell array of char vectors C2 = convertStringToCharArgs({"a",'b'; 1,"d"})
